name: @azure-rest/ai-inference
description: Inference API for Azure-supported AI models
author: Microsoft Corporation

scripts.build: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run vendored mkdirp ./review && dev-tool run extract-api
scripts.build:test: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run build-test
scripts.clean: dev-tool run vendored rimraf --glob dist dist-* test-dist temp types *.tgz *.log
scripts.extract-api: dev-tool run vendored rimraf review && dev-tool run vendored mkdirp ./review && dev-tool run extract-api
scripts.generate: dev-tool run vendored rimraf ./src/generated && dev-tool run vendored mkdirp ./src/generated && cp tsp-location.yaml ./src/generated && tsp-client update -o ./src/generated && dev-tool run vendored rimraf ./src/generated/tsp-location.yaml
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.lint: dev-tool run vendored eslint package.json api-extractor.json src test
scripts.lint:fix: dev-tool run vendored eslint package.json api-extractor.json src test --fix --fix-type [problem,suggestion]
scripts.test: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && npm run unit-test:node && dev-tool run bundle && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test
scripts.test:browser: npm run clean && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:node: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && npm run unit-test:node && npm run integration-test:node
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser
scripts.unit-test:browser: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-test && dev-tool run test:vitest --browser --hookTimeout=50000
